summary: This is an email from Bobbi C. Sternheim to Christian Everdel and others regarding Ghislaine Maxwell, with an embedded message from Mark S. Cohen. It appears to be legal or administrative correspondence related to Maxwell's case, referencing her inmate number 02879-509.
